title.rendered: Digiperform is the perfect mentor to start a career in digital marketing. – Hema Gayatri Neralla

content.rendered:
Digital marketing is one of the booming careers of this millennial and the career-oriented students who keep themselves updated with the current scenario understand the same very well. They know, today, the market is solely dependent on the internet and businesses are trying every way to make most out of it. The same fact has been realized by one of our Digiperformers from Vizag, Hema Gayatri Neralla, who is an undergraduate student and decided to learn digital marketing to create better career opportunities for her. She understands that the companies are in utter need to hire skilled digital marketers. Being a discipline of Information Technology, she decided to understand and learn the process of digital marketing and joined our advanced level digital marketing course (dCDMC). During our visit to Vizag, we decided to ask her when she decided to learn digital marketing and how Digiperform played a role in her learning process.

Here we go! Digiperform: It’s a pleasure to connect with you! Before heading further, we would like to know a bit about you.

Hema: I am from Visakhapatnam. Currently, I am pursuing graduation in Information Technology from Raghu Institute of Technology. Also, I have just completed my advanced level digital marketing training from Digiperform.

Digiperform: What originally attracted you to choose digital marketing as your career?

Hema: Being a student of Information Technology, I have realized that nowadays everything is revolving around digitalization where from shopping to reading news, online banking to education, all are dependent on the internet. And, today, businesses understand the need to get digital to reach out their maximum number of customers. Therefore, I have had felt a need to learn more about it and get prepared for my career as well. With digital marketing, I wanted to learn how to attract online customers and stand out first in the competition.  

Digiperform: What exactly that makes us stand out from the competition & urge you to choose us over others?

Hema: First, Digiperform’ LMS (Learning Management System) is worth to learn from where you will get all the basic as well as the advanced level of modules of digital marketing. The best part that you can avail the access from any time and anywhere, all you need is the internet. Secondly, they are the perfect mentor where the management is very helpful and experienced ones. The trainers are very good and approachable where you can get help to learn more if you have missed anything with the help of backup classes.

Digiperform: Tell us about your favorite experience you had with us, whether as a learner or as a customer?

Hema: As a learner, I have had a great experience with Digiperform. They are the perfect mentor and helped me to start my digital marketing career as well.

Digiperform: Would you consider Digiperform as a trusted & reliable resource for Digital marketing training? Why?

Hema: Yes. They have experienced trainers who teach practically with live examples for a better knowledge.

Digiperform: If you were to review our training program, what score would you give it out of 10?

Hema: I would rate Digiperform 9 out of 10.

Digiperform: Where do you see yourself in the next 5 years?

Hema: I wish to see myself as a Digital Marketing Manager in the coming 5 years.

Digiperform: If you had a piece of advice to someone just starting out, what would it be?

Hema: I would suggest one should learn and prepare for his/her career as per the trend. Today, digital marketing is the trending industry and its worth learning it.

Digiperform: Finally, Describe Digiperform in one line.

Hema: One of the best Digital Marketing Training Institute.   Thanks for sharing your valuable feedback. We wish you a great success for your future.
